Script.name: Reddit keyboard shortcuts
Script.description: Add some keyboard shortcuts to reddit

Script.name: SMBC Reader
Script.description: Makes reading Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal more pleasurable, with adblock and hidden comic (votey) viewer.

Script.name: xkcd Fan (+keyboard shortcuts)
Script.description: Read xkcd with only comic and alt-text and keyboard shortcuts, fullscreen fit and more

Script.name: Dinosaur Comics extra text
Script.description: Displays extra text on dinosaur comics pages.

Script.name: Google Search Enhanced Keyboard Navigation
Script.description: Enables Google's experimental keyboard shortcut navigation in search results, plus additional feature for jumping to Next/Previous result pages.

Script.name: Mangafox3 Fit Image
Script.description: Thnx to Knace. A mangafox.com script: Loads several images (up to entire chapter) vertically for your reading pleasure. You only need to scroll down to continue reading which keeps the flow of the manga. Also makes saving the entire chapter simple and easy!
